section3.intro: Grivus respects your privacy. This section explains how your information is handled.

s1.title: 3.1. Information We Collect
s1.personalDataText: Grivus does not require you to create an account. We do not collect personally identifiable information (such as your name, email address, or phone number).
s1.appDataText: Any data you enter (such as habits, reminders, or preferences) is stored locally on your device and is not transmitted to us.
s1.analyticsText: Grivus does not use third-party analytics, tracking, or advertising tools.

s2.title: 3.2. How We Use Your Data
s2.p1: Your data is only used within the app to provide habit tracking, reminders, and progress insights.
s2.p2: We do not sell, rent, or share your data with anyone.

s3.title: 3.3. Data Storage & Security
s3.p1: All habit data is stored locally on your device.
s3.p2: If you enable iCloud sync, your data will be securely stored in your Apple iCloud account, where Apple's iCloud Privacy Policy applies.
s3.p3: Deleting the app will remove your local data from your device. iCloud data can be removed via iOS Settings ‚Üí Apple ID ‚Üí iCloud ‚Üí Manage Storage ‚Üí Grivus.

s4.title: 3.4. Notifications
s4.p1: If you enable notifications, Grivus will schedule local reminders for your habits.
s4.p2: These are handled entirely on your device ‚Äî no external servers or personal identifiers are involved.

s5.title: 3.5. Children's Privacy
s5.content: Grivus is not directed toward children under 13 and does not knowingly collect any data from them. If you believe a child has submitted data through the app, please contact us for assistance.
